summary: This is an email chain between attorneys regarding the deferred prosecution application in the case of US v. Noel. It involves the transmission of legal documents and coordination between counsel.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Attorney from FOY & SEPLOWITZ LLC sending the deferred prosecution application for the case US v. Noel via FedEx and digitally.

persons.name: Eric Sarraga
persons.context: Recipient of the email and the deferred prosecution application materials in the case US v. Noel.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the deferred prosecution application in the case US v. Noel.

connections.description: Attorneys communicating and coordinating the submission of legal documents (deferred prosecution application) for the case US v. Noel.
Jason Foy is submitting a deferred prosecution application on behalf of Tova Noel, indicating a legal representation relationship.

events.title: Submission of Deferred Prosecution Application
events.description: Attorney Jason Foy sends the deferred prosecution application for Tova Noel via FedEx and electronically to other counsel.

keyFacts: A deferred prosecution application is being submitted for Tova Noel in the case US v. Noel.
Attorney Jason Foy of FOY & SEPLOWITZ LLC is handling the submission and coordinating with co-counsel.
The application was sent both physically via FedEx and electronically on February 26, 2021.
